name: Classic Leather Watch
description: Timeless elegance meets modern craftsmanship. This classic leather watch features a genuine leather strap and precision quartz movement.

name: Sport Digital Watch
description: Perfect for active lifestyles. Water-resistant, shock-resistant, and packed with features including stopwatch, timer, and backlight.

name: Elegant Rose Gold Watch
description: Sophisticated rose gold finish with a delicate design. Perfect for special occasions and everyday elegance.

name: Minimalist Silver Watch
description: Clean, minimalist design with a silver case and mesh band. Ideal for those who appreciate simplicity and style.

name: Luxury Chronograph Watch
description: High-end chronograph with multiple sub-dials, tachymeter bezel, and premium materials. A statement piece for watch enthusiasts.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your health and fitness with this advanced smartwatch. Heart rate monitor, GPS, and smartphone connectivity included.

name: Vintage Pocket Watch
description: A beautiful reproduction of a classic pocket watch. Perfect for collectors and those who appreciate vintage style.

name: Diamond Accent Watch
description: Luxurious watch with diamond accents on the bezel. A stunning piece that combines elegance with precision timekeeping.

name: Diver's Professional Watch
description: Professional-grade dive watch with 200m water resistance, rotating bezel, and luminous markers. Built for adventure.

name: Fashion Statement Watch
description: Bold design with unique color combinations. Make a statement with this eye-catching timepiece.
